exec-cockpit-fe-2.title: Cockpit 2.0 FE-2: Macro Canvas + Scatter Plot + Inspector Panel
exec-cockpit-fe-2.instruction_raw:
Implement Phase 2 of the Cockpit 2.0 Frontend. PREREQUISITE: FE-1 must be merged first.

=== SAME ARCHITECTURAL MANDATE AS FE-1 ===
HTML = Structure, CSS = Design, JS = Rendering. Container-Component pattern mandatory.

=== SCOPE ===
1. **Layer 2 — Macro Canvas** (frontend/src/containers/MacroCanvasContainer.tsx):
   - LEFT: TimeSeriesPanel.tsx — GDP, CPI, Unemployment, Gini (Recharts LineChart)
     * Maintain rolling buffer of last 200 ticks from WebSocket stream
     * CSS: frontend/src/components/macro/timeseries.css
   - CENTER: SurvivalScatter.tsx — Scatter plot (X: risk_tolerance, Y: wealth)
     * Fetch from GET /api/v1/genealogy on tab activation
     * Living agents = dot, Dead agents = X mark (color-coded)
     * CSS: frontend/src/components/macro/scatter.css
   - RIGHT: SectorFlow.tsx — Money flow summary (Household/Firm/Gov balances)
     * CSS: frontend/src/components/macro/sectorflow.css

2. **Layer 3 — Inspector Panel** (frontend/src/containers/InspectorContainer.tsx):
   - Slide-over panel from right side on agent click
   - Fetch GET /api/v1/inspector/{agent_id}
   - Subcomponents:
     * AgentIdentity.tsx: ID, type, alive status
     * AgentWallet.tsx: currency balances
     * AgentDecisionLog.tsx: timeline of decisions (chat-like UI)
     * AgentInventory.tsx: item list
   - CSS: frontend/src/components/inspector/inspector.css

3. **Glassmorphism Design**: Apply dark mode + glass-card aesthetic from existing App.css. All new CSS files must use the existing design tokens (--background, --foreground, --primary, etc.).

Reference: design/3_work_artifacts/specs/MISSION_COCKPIT_API_CONTRACT.md

exec-cockpit-stabilization.title: Cockpit 2.0 Stabilization: Fix Regressions
exec-cockpit-stabilization.instruction_raw:
Restore the test suite to 100% PASS by fixing Pydantic-related regressions.

**Fix Areas:**
1. **dashboard/components/controls.py**: Change all `schema['key']` style accesses to `schema.key` (dot notation) for ParameterSchemaDTO.
2. **tests/unit/modules/system/test_command_service_unit.py**: Update all `RegistryEntry()` calls to include `key='...'` (e.g. key='test_param').
3. **tests/system/test_command_service_rollback.py**: Fix any validation errors in Registry/UndoRecord setups.

Run `pytest -rfE --tb=line tests/` after fixes to verify success.
